welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Neustadt am Rubenberge, a charming city known for its picturesque landscape and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer. We hope your stay here is unforgettable!"

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal for international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional and low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Finkenwerder Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Finkenwerder Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Hildesheim Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
